Title: Gov Ododo orders demolition of criminal hideouts in Kogi
Summary: Gov Ododo orders demolition of Sambel Joint in Idoji, Okene Local Government Area, following credible intelligence reports linking the facility to criminal activities . The Executive Governor of Kogi State, Ahmed Usman Ododo, ordered the demolition .

Title: Court mulls deregistration of ADC, four other parties over alleged infractions
Summary: Federal High Court sitting in Abuja is set to consider deregistration of Africa Democratic Congress (ADC) and four other political parties over alleged constitutional and electoral infractions . The suit was instituted by the National Forum of Former Presidents .

Title: Military will confront all threats to democracy – CDS Oluyede
Summary: The Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) Gen. Oluyede says the Armed Forces will continue to fight against terrorism and all forms of criminality .

Title: Luxury Retailer Qbeescloset, Founded by Bola Coker, Hosts Intimate Dinner to Celebrate Lagos Store Launch
Summary: Qbeescloset hosted an intimate end-of-year dinner for a select circle of family, friends, and clients . The evening was designed to reflect the brand’s core values of refined taste, intentional curation, and a deeply refined taste .

Title: Shettima leads tribute to fallen heroes in Abuja as Tinubu engages abroad
Summary: Vice President Kashim Shettima is attending proceedings marking the 2026 Armed Forces Celebration and Remembrance Day . The Vice President is representing President Bola Tinubu, who is currently in Nigeria .

Title: Suspected Fulani militants unleash mayhem on Delta community
Summary: Suspected Fulani herders occupy the surrounding bushes in the community, preventing residents from accessing their farms . Vanguard gathered that a group of suspected Fulani herdsmen occupy the area .

Title: Turkey opposes military operations against Iran
Summary: Turkey opposes military operations against Iran . "We believe the authentic problems of Iran should be resolved by themselves," Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan says .

Title: NCoS foils drug smuggling attempt at Kano high Court, arrests suspect
Summary: NCoS foils drug smuggling attempt at Kano high Court, arrests suspect . 20-year-old man allegedly tried to smuggle Indian hemp in a loaf of bread into a custodial facility .

Title: Trump says Iran killings stopped, Tehran says ‘no plan for hanging’
Summary: Trump says he has received assurances from "very important sources on the other side" that Tehran had now stopped executions . But in a surprise announcement at the White House, Trump said he had now received assurances that executions would not go ahead .

Title: ADC Primary: Atiku doesn’t have dollars to bribe delegates  —  Momodu
Summary: Momodu explains that campaign funding should not be confused with bribery . Money is needed for legitimate campaign logistics and election day operations, he said .
